name: NoHugs
description: Disables General Cog hug command so hugs from RolePlay cog can be used easily
install_msg:
Thanks for installing `nohugs` cog! Please enjoy it :D 
 
 Please note that cog load order is not guaranteed, so it's not guaranteed to work every time, even thought my initial tests and reboots seemed to work. Just keep this in mind
author: Aikaterna
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store end user data.
